titles.title: To direct the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to convey an easement to St. Louis County, Missouri, for the construction, operation, and maintenance of a road in Lemay, Missouri.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/20/2006--Introduced. Requires the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to convey an easement to St. Louis County, Missouri, for use in the construction, operation, and maintenance of a road in Lemay, Missouri.
